doc_ID.description: The document id of the RD3 that this tombstone replaces

doc_type.description: The document type to indicate the node such that it if excluded from default harvest

doc_version.description: The literal for the version number of this tombstone document

replaces.description: The ‘replaces’ property of the RD3 that this tombstone replaces.

doc_ID.description: The doc_ID of the first RD3 encountered by node to signal tombstone creation

public_key_fingerprint.description: The OpenPGP fingerprint of the signing key used to verify the first RD3 that signaled tombstone

public_key_locations.description: A list of URLs that the public_key used for verifying the first RD3 that signaled tombstone may be retrieved

create_timestamp.description: timestamp of when tombstone was first created

resource_locator.description: The resource locator(s) of the RD3 this tombstone marks.

do_not_distribute.description: Flag to indicate that this instance MUST not be distributed to other nodes.
